column2: Alpha to HQ. Looks like the Reds were brewing up some kind of trap for our helicopters. Sighted Shilkas, shot same. Over.
Roger that, Alpha. There might be a couple cases of cold beer waiting for you back at base. Courtesy of 1st Air Cav.
We're now sending Delta Platoon to relieve you. Your mission is complete. Papa Bear, signing off.
